text:
yadAkU#tAth saqmasu#srOddhRuqdO vAq mana#sO vAq saMBRu#taqM cakShu#ShO vA | 
tamanuq prEhi# sukRuqtasya# lOqkaM ~Myatrar.Sha#yaH prathamaqjA yE pu#rAqNAH ||
Eqta(gm) sa#dhasthaq pari# tE dadAmiq yamAqvahA$cCEvaqdhiM jAqtavE#dAH |
aqnvAqgaqntA yaqj~japa#tirvOq atraq ta(gg) sma# jAnIta paraqmE vyO#mann ||
jAqnIqtAdE#naM paraqmE vyO#maqn dEvA$H sadhasthA viqda rUqpama#sya | 
yadAqgacCA$t - [  ] 30
